channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Taxing Supreme Court Argument
item.description: If tariffs are taxes — and they are — they can’t be imposed by presidents without very clear directions from Congress.

item.title: Tuesday's election wins embolden Democrats in shutdown fight over affordable health care
item.description: Senate Democrats are seizing on their party's widespread victories in Tuesday's elections as reason to continue their shutdown fight over health care ...

item.title: It Is Time to Be Done with Shutdowns
item.description: We’re five weeks into a government shutdown. It should be the last one.

item.title: New York Times Coverage Avoids the Third Rails of Sex Trafficking
item.description: We must not ignore the role of illegal immigration and abortion.

item.title: The Nationalization of Elections Is Anti-American
item.description: Our Founding Fathers fought for our right not to care about who New Jersey elects as governor.

item.title: Poll: Majority Of Americans Want Prosecutions In Biden Autopen Scandal
item.description: So far, there’s been no rush to accountability — from congressional Republicans or at Attorney General Pam Bondi’s DOJ.

item.title: In Miami, Trump says he will make 'America affordable again'
item.description: President Trump aimed to paint the economy in a good light as he spoke at the American Business Forum in Miami on Wednesday.

item.title: Pro-Abortion Culture, Not Just Abortion Itself, Is Dangerous And Deadly For Women
item.description: The repercussions of radical abortion culture ultimately ripped a teen mom and her baby away from the world.
